|vo_01_01_title      = 첫 만남…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = 난 리월에서 온 요리사 향릉이야! 다양한… 다양한 요리가 내 특기지. 연습을 많이 했는데도 긴장되네, 헤헤
|vo_01_01_rm         = Nan Riworeseo on yorisa Hyangreung'iya! Dayanghan, dayanghan yo... yoriga nae teukgiji, yeonseubeul mani haetneundedo ginjangdoene, hehe
|vo_01_01_tl         = I'm a chef from Liyue, Xiangling! Various, various r... recipes are my specialty, I'm nervous even though I did many practices, hehe.

|vo_02_01_title      = 잡담・간식
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: Snacks
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Snacks.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = 디저트 먹고 좀 쉴래? 파이어 슬라임 한 소쿠리 준비했다구~
|vo_02_01_rm         = Dijeoteu meokgo jom swillae? Paieo seullaim han sokuri junbihaetdagu~
|vo_02_01_tl         = Do you want to rest after eating some desert? I prepared one basket of pyro slimes~

|vo_02_02_title      = 잡담・화염 슬라임
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Pyro Slime
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Pyro Slime.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = 매운맛이 좋을까… 갈릭맛이 좋을까?
|vo_02_02_rm         = Maeunmasi joeulkka... gallikmasi joeulkka?
|vo_02_02_tl         = Would spicy taste be good... or garlic taste be good?

|vo_02_03_title      = 잡담・식자재 찾기
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Looking for Food
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Looking for Food.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = 심심하니 같이 식자재나 찾아보자!
|vo_02_03_rm         = simsimhani gachi sikjajaena chajaboja!
|vo_02_03_tl         = since I'm bored, let's find some food ingredients together!

|vo_03_01_title      = 비가 올 때・무드
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When It Rains: Attitude
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains - Attitude.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = 흐음, 난 비오는 날 별로 안 좋아해
|vo_03_01_rm         = Heueum, nan bioneun nal byeollo an joahae
|vo_03_01_tl         = Hmm, I don't like rainy days much.

|vo_03_02_title      = 비가 올 때・부주의
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = When It Rains: Negligence
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains - Negligence.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = 가만… 널어놓은 옷이 있었나…
|vo_03_02_rm         = Gaman... neoreonoeun osi isseotna...
|vo_03_02_tl         = Wait... were there clothes I spread out...

|vo_03_03_title      = 비가 그친 후…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = After the Rain
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} After the Rain.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = 가자 가자, 송이버섯 찾으러 가자
|vo_03_03_rm         = Gaja gaja, song'ibeoseot chajeureo gaja
|vo_03_03_tl         = Go go, let's go find pine mushrooms.

|vo_03_04_title      = 바람이 불 때…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When It's Windy
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It's Windy.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = 슬라임은 이런 날씨를 가장 좋아해. 그러니 이 틈에 왕창 잡자! 내가 슬라임 빙수 해줄게!
|vo_03_04_rm         = Seullaimeun ireon nalssireul gajang joahae. Geureoni i teume wangchang japja! Naega seullaim bingsu haejulge!
|vo_03_04_tl         = Slimes like this kind of weather the most. So let's capture a lot of them at this moment! I'll make you slime ice flakes!

|vo_04_01_title      = 아침 인사…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = 마침 잘 왔어! 같이 식자재나 찾으러 갈래?
|vo_04_01_rm         = Machim jal wasseo! Gachi sikjajaena chajeureo gallae?
|vo_04_01_tl         = You're just in time! Do you want to go find some food ingredients?

|vo_04_02_title      = 점심 인사…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = 점심 식사 준비됐어. 어서 와! 늦으면 없다구
|vo_04_02_rm         = <!--Jeomsimsiksa junbidwaesseo, eoseo wa! Ehyo... neujeumyeon eopdago-->
|vo_04_02_tl         = Lunch is ready, hurry up! Phew... there will be nothing if you're late.

|vo_04_03_title      = 저녁 인사…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = 야식 먹게? 숯불 바위도마뱀구이를 만들고 있었어. 빤히 보지만 말고 어서 먹어봐!
|vo_04_03_rm         = <!--Yasik meokge? Sutbul bawidomabaemguireul mandeulgo isseosseo. Ei, ppanhi bojiman malgo eoseo meogeobwa!-->
|vo_04_03_tl         = You're going to have a late night snack? I was making charcoal-grilled rock lizard. Hey, don't just stare at it and try it!

|vo_04_04_title      = 굿나잇…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = 너… 나 몰래 맛있는 음식 먹으려는 건 아니지? 아, 쉬고 있었구나…. 그럼 잘 자
|vo_04_04_rm         = <!--Neo... na mollae masinneun eumsik meogeuryeoneun geon aniji? A, swigo isseotguna... Hehe, geureom jal ja-->
|vo_04_04_tl         = You... you're not trying to eat delicious food without me knowing, are you? Oh, you were resting.... Hehe, good night, then.

|vo_05_01_title      = 향릉 자신에 대해…
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character}.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = 몬드성의 드래곤을 봤어? 얼마나 커? 와, 정말이야? 드래곤으로 스테이크를 만든다면&mdash;&mdash;얼마나 근사할까!
|vo_05_01_rm         = Mondeuseong-ui deuraegoneul bwasseo? Eolmana keo? Wa, jeongmariya? Deuraegoneuro seuteikeureul mandeundamyeon&mdash;eolmana geunsahalkka!
|vo_05_01_tl         = Have you seen the dragon of Mondstadt? How big is it? Wow, really? If I make a steak out of a dragon&mdash;how nice would it be!

|vo_06_01_title      = 우리에 대해・장점
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Strengths
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Strengths.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = 길찾기보다 요리를 훨씬 잘하지만… 에라, 모르겠다, 외출할 때 날 부르면 분명 문제없어!
|vo_06_01_rm         = Gilchatgiboda yorireul hwolssin jalhajiman... era, moreugetta. Oechulhal ttae nal bureumyeon bunmyeong munjeeopsseo!
|vo_06_01_tl         = I'm way better at cooking than pathfinding, but... eh, I don't know. If you call me when you go out, there will definitely be no problems!

|vo_06_02_title      = 우리에 대해・새로운 지식
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: New Knowledge
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - New Knowledge.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 널 알고 나서부터 요리 외의 지식을 많이 알게 된 것 같아. 응? 음… 예를 들면 어떤 게 있냐고? 으… 음… 갑자기 물어보니까 생각이 잘 안 나네. 됐어 됐어, 나 원래 그런 거 잘 못 해. 그냥 새로운 요리나 좀 해줄게!
|vo_06_02_rm         = <!--Neol algonaseobuteo yori oeui jisigeul mani algedoen geot gata, eng? Eng?... Ige da museun jilmunirani? Eung... eung... gapjagi geureoke mureoboni saenggagi jal an nane, dwaesseo dwaesseo, na wonrae geureon geo jal motae, geunyang saeroun yorina jom haejulge!-->
|vo_06_02_tl         = I think I've learned a lot of knowledge other than cooking since I got to know you, huh? Huh?... What kind of question is this? Yeah... Yeah... I can't think of anything because you suddenly asked me like that, okay okay, I'm not good at those, I'll just cook you a new dish!

|vo_07_01_title      = 「신의 눈」에 대해…
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 어떤 때라도 난 모든 사람이 좋아하는 요리를 만들 수 있어. 신도 이게 정확한 일인 걸 알고 계셔서 대사부께도 없는 신의 눈을 내게 주셨잖아…. 뭐라고 해야 하나. 아, 그래! 격려의 차원으로!
|vo_07_01_rm         = Eotteon ttaerado nan modeun sarami joahaneun yorireul mandeul su isseo. Sindo ige jeonghwakhan irin geol algo gyesyeoseo daesabukkedo eomneun Sin-ui Nuneul naege jusyeotjana... Mworago haeya hana. A, geurae! Gyeokryeo-ui chawoneuro!
|vo_07_01_tl         = Any time, I can make food everyone likes. God knows that this is the right thing, so they gave me a Vision that even my master doesn't have... What do I say. Ah, yes! As an encouragement!

|vo_07_02_title      = 하고 싶은 이야기…
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 배탈이 났다면 네온플라워 차를 마시면 돼! 엥? 나도 그런 것쯤은 알고 있다구!
|vo_07_02_rm         = Baetari nattamyeon ne'onpeullaweo chareul masimyeon dwae! Eng? Nado geureon geotjjeumeun algo itdagu!
|vo_07_02_tl         = If you got a stomachache, you just have to drink Neonflower Tea! Eh? I do know those kinds of things!

|vo_07_03_title      = 흥미있는 일…
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = 나 양파 좋아해! …양파를 썰며 울지 않는 법을 수십 가지 시험해봤는, 하나도 안 통하더라. 하지만 그래도 양파가 너무 좋아!
|vo_07_03_rm         = Na yangpa joahae! ...Yangpareul sseolmyeo ulji anneun beobeul susip gaji siheomhaebwatneunde, hanado an tonghadeora. Hajiman geuraedo yangpaga neomu joa!
|vo_07_03_tl         = I like onions! ...I tested numerous ways not to cry while cutting onions, none of them worked. Though I love onions so much!

|vo_08_01_title      = 백출에 대해…
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Baizhu]]
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Baizhu.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 안개꽃 향기가 나! 음~ 백 선생님 냄새, 백 선생님이 진찰하러 온 거야? 어디가 아픈 거야? 어지러워 아니면 위통? 목이 따끔거리니? 기력이 없어? 아… 아픈 게 아니구나, 다행이다. 아프면 백 선생님이 엄청나게 쓴 약을 지어주신다구
|vo_08_01_rm         = Angaekkot hyanggiga na! Eum~ Baek seonsaengnim naemsae, Baek seonsaengnimi jinchalhareo on geoya? Eodiga apeun geoya? Eojireowo animyeon witong? Mogi ttakkeumgeorini? Giryeogi eopsseo? A... apeun ge aniguna, dahaeng'ida. Apeumyeon Baek seonsaengnimi eomcheongnage sseun yageul jieojusindagu
|vo_08_01_tl         = It smells like Mist Flowers! Hmm~ the scent of Mr. Bai, did he come to examine you? Are you sick somewhere? Dizzy or stomachache? Does your throat itch? No energy? Ah... you're not sick, it's a relief. If you're sick, Mr. Bai will prepare very bitter medicine for you.

|vo_08_02_title      = 응광에 대해…
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Ningguang]]
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Ningguang.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = 방금 그분 「천권」님이네…. 흠, 이리 가까이 와봐, 좀 더! 천권님은 아주 무시무시한 분이야. 항구에서 일어나는 일은 전부 다 아셔. 그러니까 그분의 눈에 띄지 않게 조심해…
|vo_08_02_rm         = <!--O! Banggeum geubun Cheongwon nimine... Heum, iri gakkai wabwa, jom deo, Cheongwon imeun aju musimusihan buniya, hanggueseo ireonaneun ireun jeonbu da asyeo, geureonikka geubun-ui nune ttuiji anke josimhae...-->
|vo_08_02_tl         = Oh! The person just right there, it's the Tianquan... Hmm, come here closer, a bit more, the Tianquan is a very scary person, she knows everything happening in the harbor, so be careful not to be spotted by her...

|vo_08_03_title      = 호두에 대해…
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Hu Tao]]
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Hu Tao.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = 음, 너도 호두한테 당했어? 그 애는 항상 방심한 틈에 뒤로 숨어서 이렇게 갑자기 등을 때리지, 헤헤헤 웃으면서! 흥, 난 너무 마음이 넓어. 매번 그 아이가 주는 매화떡에 홀랑 넘어가 다 받아준다니까
|vo_08_03_rm         = <!--Eum, neodo hudohante danghaesseo? Geu aeneun hangsang bangsimhan teume dwiro sumeoseo ireoke gapjagi deung'eul ttaeriji, hehehe useumyeonseo, heung, na neomu maeumi neolbeo, maebeon geu aiga juneun maehwatteoge hollang neomeogaseo da badajujana-->
|vo_08_03_tl         = Hmm, you got tricked by Hu Tao as well? She always suddenly hits my back by hiding behind whenever I'm careless, smiling "Hehehe", hmph, I'm too big-hearted, I always let her do it because of the apricot rice cakes she gives me.

|vo_08_04_title      = 디오나에 대해…
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Diona]]
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Diona.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 샘물 마을의 디오나! 아아, 디오나가 특별한 맛의 술을 만들 수 있다고 해서 일부러 찾아가 본 적이 있어! 술 만드는 비법을 요리에 접목할 수 있다면, 맛있는 요리를 만들어 낼 수 있을지도 몰라. 하지만, 그녀가 내게 준 맥주 중에 도마뱀 꼬리를 담그거나, 민들레술에 작은 훈제 생선을 넣거나한 비법으로 만든 술은… 맛이 별로였어. ㅠ ㅠ, 역시 믿을 건 자신뿐인 건가?
|vo_08_04_rm         = <!--Saemmul maeul-ui Diona! Aa, Dionaga teukbyeolhan masui sureul mandeul su itdago haeseo ilbureo chajaga bon jeokdo isseo! Sul mandeneun bibeobeul yorie jeopmokhal su itdamyeon, masitneun yorireul mandeureo naelsu isseuljido molla. Hajiman, geunyeoga naege jun maekjue domabaem kkorireul damgeugeona, mindeullesure jageun hunje saengseoneul neotgeona... han bibeobeuro mandeun sureun masi byeolloyeosseo... Yeoksi mideul geon jasinppunin geonga?-->
|vo_08_04_tl         = Diona from Springvale! Ah, I heard that Diona could make a drink of a special taste, so I went to meet her! If I can incorporate the secret of making alcohol into cooking, I may be able to make delicious dishes. But, either dipping the lizard's tail in the beer she gave me, or putting little smoked fish in Dandelion Wine... Those recipes for alcohol didn't taste good. I guess I'm the only one who I can trust?

|vo_08_05_title      = 북두에 대해…
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Beidou]]
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Beidou.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = 북두 언니는 사람이 정말 좋아! 언니를 따라 항해에 나가면 매번 신선한 식재료를 많이 잡을 수 있어! 문어발은 국을 끓일 때 가장 좋고, 해천청은 데친 후 고추로 잘 무쳐야 해. 헤헤, 북두 언니뿐만 아니라 「남십자」 선원들도 내가 만든 요리를 아주 좋아해
|vo_08_05_rm         = <!--Bukdu eonnineun sarami jeongmal joa! Eonnireul ttara hanghaee hagamyeon maebeon sinseonhan sikjaeryoreul mani jabeul su isseo! Muneobareun gugeun kkeuril ttae gajang joko, haecheoncheong'eun dechin hu gochuro jal muchyeoya hae. Bukdu eonnippunman anira, "Namsipja" seonwondeuldo naega mandeun yorireul aju joahae-->
|vo_08_05_tl         = Beidou is a really nice person! If I follow her on a voyage, I can catch a lot of fresh ingredients every time! Octopus feet are the best when making soup, and seaweed should be blanched and seasoned with red pepper. Not only Beidou, but "The Crux" crew love the food I cook as well.

|vo_08_06_title      = 종려에 대해…
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Zhongli]]
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Zhongli.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = 까다로운 손님도 많았지만, 맛에 일가견이 있고 또 한 마디로 정곡을 찌를 수 있는 사람은 정말 종려 선생님밖에 없어! 그날 내가 올린 첫 번째 요리는 「소금 두부」였는데, 한 입 먹어보더니 무슨 소금을 썼냐고 물었어. 그리고 「고운각 근해에서 정제한 해염을 써봐. 그 식감으로 두부는 더욱 신선한 맛을 낼 거야.」 그렇게 해봤는데 맛이 정말 많이 달라졌어. 어때, 그는 정말 대단하지?
|vo_08_06_rm         = <!--Kkadaroun sonnimdo manatjiman, mase ilgagyeoni itgo tto han madiro jeonggogeul jjireul su inneun sarameun jeongmal Jongryeo seonsaengnimbakke eopsseo! Geu nal naega ollin cheot beonjjae yorineun "Sogeum Dubu"yeotneunde, han ipman meogeotdeoni museun sogeumeul sseotnyago mureosseo, geurigo "Goungak geunhaeeseo jeongjehan haeyeomeul sseobwa, geu sikgameuro dubuneun deouk sinseonhan maseul nael geoya". Geureoke haebwatneunde masi jeongmal mani dallajyeosseo. Eottae, geuneun jeongmal daedanhaji!-->
|vo_08_06_tl         = There were many choosy customers, but there is only Mr. Zhongli who has a point in taste and also who can hit the mark with one sentence! The first dish I served that day was "Salt Tofu", he asked me which salt I used after having a bite, then said "Use purified sea salt near Guyun Stone Forest, the tofu will taste fresher with that texture". I followed it, and the taste really changed a lot. See, isn't he amazing!

|vo_08_07_title      = 중운에 대해…
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Chongyun]]
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Chongyun.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = 중운, 그는 항상 행추와 「만민당」에 밥 먹으러 오는데… 음, 아니, 행추에게 끌려온다고 할까? 하지만 중운은 뜨거운 음식을 먹지 않아. 뜨거운 음식이 상에 오를 때마다 행추는 공손하게 「잘 먹겠습니다」라고 말하고는 젓가락을 들어 요리의 맛에 대해 일일이 평가하기 시작하는데, 그의 칭찬을 듣고 나도 달려가서 먹어보고 싶을 정도라구! 네가 중운의 그 눈빛을 못 봐서 아쉽구나, 하하하. 꽤 재밌어, 그 둘은
|vo_08_07_rm         = <!--Jung'un, geuneun hangsang Haengchuwa "Manmindang"e bapmeogeuro oneunde... eum, ani, Haengchuege kkeullyeoondago halkka? Hajiman Jung'uneun tteugeoun eumsigeul meokji ana. Tteugeoun eumsigi sang'e oreul ttaemada Haengchuneun gongsonhage "Sillyehammida"rago malhagoneun, jeotgarageul deureo yori-ui mase daehae iriri pyeonggahagi sijakhaneunde, geu-ui chingchaneul deutgo nado dallyeogaseo meogeobogo sipeul jeongdoragu! Nega Jung'un-ui geu nunbicheul mot bwaseo aswipguna, hahaha. Kkwae jaemisseo, geu dureun-->
|vo_08_07_tl         = Chongyun, he always comes to "Wanmin Restaurant" to eat with Xingqiu... hmm, no, maybe being dragged by Xingqiu? But Chongyun doesn't eat hot food. Whenever hot food is served, Xingqiu always politely says "Excuse me", and raises his chopsticks to evaluate each flavor of the food, it's as if I want to eat it after listening to hiscompliments! It's a shame that you couldn't see that gaze of Chongyun, hahaha, the two are pretty much entertaining.

|vo_08_08_title      = 감우에 대해…
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Ganyu]]
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Ganyu.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = 감우? 음… 아아, 알겠다. 그 채식주의자 손님! 「만민당」에 왔던 적이 많진 않은데, 항상 구석에서 혼자 조용히 먹더라고. 혼자 외롭게 먹는 모습이 너무 불쌍해서 항상 음식을 좀 더 많이 퍼주는데, 그걸 전부 다 먹을 줄이야! 역시 사람은 외모로 판단하면 안 돼
|vo_08_08_rm         = Gamu? Eum... aa, algetta. Geu chaesikjuuija sonnim! "Manmindang"e watdeon jeogi manchin aneunde, hangsang guseogeseo honja joyonghi meokdeorago. Honja oeropge meokneun moseubi neomu bulssanghaeseo hangsang eumsigeul jom deo mani peojuneunde, geugeol jeonbu da meogeul juriya! Yeoksi sarameun oemoro pandanhamyeon an dwae
|vo_08_08_tl         = Ganyu? Hmm... ah, I know. That vegetarian customer! She hasn't visited "Wanmin Restaurant" much, but she always ate silently in the corner. I felt so sorry to see her eating alone, so I always gave her more food, but I didn't expect her to eat it all! You can't judge a person by their looks.

|vo_08_09_title      = 요요에 대해…
|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Yaoyao]]
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yaoyao.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx         = 헤헤, 요요는 내 자랑스러운 후배야! 근데 요즘엔 「만민당」에 놀러 오지 않네. 큰 사부님이 걱정하시는 모양이야…. 흥, 운래 문어를 생으로 먹으면 얼마나 맛있는데, 요요는 먹지도 못하게 하고 큰 사부님까지 불러서 날 혼나게 했어. 으… 어쩔 땐 누가 선배인지 모르겠다니까
|vo_08_09_rm         = <!--Hehe, Yoyoneun nae jarangseureoun hubaeya! Geunde yojeumen "Manmindang"e nolleo oji anne. Sabunimi geokjeonghasineun moyang'iya... Heung, unrae muneoreul saeng'euro meogeumyeon eolmana masinneunde, Yoyoneun meokjido motage hago sabunimkkaji bulleoseo nal honnage haesseo. Eu... eojjeol ttaen nuga seonbaeinji moreugettanikka-->
|vo_08_09_tl         = Hehe, Yaoyao is my junior I'm proud of! But she doesn't come around to "Wanmin Restaurant" these days. Master seems to be worried... Hmph, eating octopus from Sea of Clouds raw is very delicious, but Yaoyao didn't let me eat it and called Master so I got scolded. Hmph... sometimes, I don't know who is the senior.

|vo_08_10_title      = 신염에 대해…
|vo_08_10_subtitle   = About [[Xinyan]]
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Xinyan.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx         = 신염은 「만민당」에 야식을 먹으러 자주 와! 행추나 중운은 못 먹는 신제품을 신염은 주저하지 않고 먹어버린다니까…. 게다가 8할 이상의 확률로 맛있어해! 진짜 괜찮은 사람이야
|vo_08_10_rm         = Sinyeomeun "Manmindang"e yasigeul meogeureo jaju wa! Haengchuna Jung'uneun mot meokneun sinjepumeul Sinyeomeun jujeohaji anko meogeobeorindanikka... Gedaga palhal isang-ui hwakryullo masisseohae! Jinjja gwaenchaneun saramiya
|vo_08_10_tl         = Xinyan comes to have late night snacks at "Wanmin Restaurant" often! She eats new food that Xingqiu or Chongyun cannot eat without hesitating... And she thinks they're delicious more than 80% of the time! She's a really good person.

|vo_08_11_title      = 야란에 대해…
|vo_08_11_subtitle   = About [[Yelan]]
|vo_08_11_friendship = 4
|vo_08_11_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yelan.ogg
|vo_08_11_tx         = 야란 언니? 당연히 기억하지. 처음 만났을 때 담백한 요리를 좋아할 거라고 생각했는데, 지금까지 내가 본 손님 중에서 매운 걸 제일 잘 먹는 사람이었어! 요리의 매운맛이 부족하다면서 절운고추를 그냥 씹어먹더라니까! 진짜 대단해
|vo_08_11_rm         = Yaran eonni? Dang'yeonhi gieokhaji. Cheoeum mannasseul ttae dambaekham yorireul joahal georago saenggakhaenneunde, jigeumkkaji naega bon sonnim jung'eseo maeun geol jeil jal meokneun saramieosseo! Yori-ui maeunmasi bujokhadamyeonseo jeorungochureul geunyang ssibeomeokdeoranikka! Jinjja daedanhae
|vo_08_11_tl         = Yelan? I definitely remember. I thought she would like plain food when I first met her, but she was a person who ate spicy food the best in between my customers! She just chewed Jueyun Chili saying the spicy taste of the food wasn't enough! How amazing.

|vo_09_01_title      = 향릉에 대해 알기・첫 번째
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = 비둘기꼬치 좀 먹을래? 먹어봐~ 나만의 비법으로 만들어서 다른 집과는 완전히 달라!
|vo_09_01_rm         = Bidulgikkochi jom meogeullae? Meogeobwa~ Naman-ui bibeobeuro mandeureoseo dareun jipgwaneun wanjeonhi dalla!
|vo_09_01_tl         = Do you want some pigeon skewers? Try it~ It's completely different from other restaurants because it's my secret recipe!

|vo_09_02_title      = 향릉에 대해 알기・두 번째
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 사부님이 가르쳐주신 창법인데, 대단하지? 배우고 싶으면 알려줄게! 하지만 그것보다… 요리를 배운다면 좋을 텐데! 내 스킬과 레시피는 널리 전파할 가치가 있다고!
|vo_09_02_rm         = <!--Sabunimi gareuchyeojusin changbeobinde, daedanhaji? Baeugo sipeumyeon allyeojulge! Hajiman geugeotboda... yorireul baeundamyeon joeul tende! Nae seukilgwa resipineun neolli jeonpadoel gachiga itdago!-->
|vo_09_02_tl         = It's spearmanship master taught me, amazing, isn't it? If you want to learn it, I'll teach you! But, before that... it would be better if you had learned cooking! My skills and recipe have a value to be spread widely!

|vo_09_03_title      = 향릉에 대해 알기・세 번째
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 소원이 뭐냐고? 물론 새로운 요리 계보 개발이지! 리월 요리는 너무 제한적이야, 물론 매운맛이 가장 중요해! 지금 당장 누룽지 고추볶음을 만들어줄게!
|vo_09_03_rm         = Sowoni mwonyago? Mullon sareorun yori gyebo gaebariji! Riwol yorineun neomu jehanjeogiya, mullon maeunmasi gajang jung'yohae1 Jigeum dangjang nurungji gochubokkeumeul mandeureojulge!
|vo_09_03_tl         = What's my wish? It's definitely making a new cooking pedigree! Liyue food is too restrictive, of course, spicy taste is the most important! I'll make you scorched rice pepper fries right now!

|vo_09_04_title      = 향릉에 대해 알기・네 번째
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 내 요리 솜씨에 껌뻑 죽겠지~? 내가 고심하여 개발한 새 요리&mdash;&mdash;무지개크리스탈 파이를 맛볼 때야. 자, 이 얇은 계란피로 싼 붉은색 다람쥐햄, 주황색 당근, 노란색 태양개구리고기, 녹색 통통 연꽃, 파란색 나비 날개… 어라? 먹기 싫어?
|vo_09_04_rm         = <!--Eum! Nae yori somssie kkeomppeok jukkejji~? Naega gosimhayeo gaebalhan sae yori&mdash;mujigaekeuriseutal paireul matbol ttaeya, ja, i yalbeun gyeranpiro ssan bulgeunsaek daramjwihaem, juhwangsaek danggeun, noransaek taeyanggaegurigogi, noksaek tongtong yeonkkot, paransaek nabi nalgae... Eora? Meokgi sireo?-->
|vo_09_04_tl         = Mhm! My cooking skills are killer, right? It's time to taste my elaborate new dish&mdash;rainbow crystal pie, now, this blood red squirrel ham wrapped in thin egg, orange carrot, yellow sun frog meat, green calla lilies, blue butterfly wings... What? You don't want to eat it?

|vo_09_05_title      = 향릉에 대해 알기・다섯 번째
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 최근에 골치 아픈 일이 있어. 분명 예전에는 푹 자면 좋아졌는데, 이건 내 스타일이 아니야. 안 되겠어! 아무래도 머리가 좋은 네가 생각해봐! 음… 네게 새로 개발한 요리를 맛보여주려고 했는데, 네가 먹고 배탈이 나면 속상할 것 같다는 생각이 자꾸 들어. 이, 이걸 어쩌면 좋을까?
|vo_09_05_rm         = <!--Jal moreugettan mariji... Bunmyeong yejeoneneun puk jamyeon joajyeonneunde, igeon nae seutairi aniya, an doegesseo! Amuraedo meoriga joeun nega saenggakhaebwa! Eum... nege saero gaebaran yorireul matboyeojuryeogo haneunde, nega meokgo baetari namyeon soksanghal geot gattaneun saenggagi jakku deureo. I, igeol eojjeomyeon joeulkka?-->
|vo_09_05_tl         = I don't know... I definitely used to sleep to get better, but this isn't my style, I can't! Think of yourself as a smart person! Um... I'm trying to make you taste the newly developed dish, but I keep thinking that I'll be upset if you get a stomachache after eating it. What should I do with this?

|vo_10_01_title      = 향릉의 취미…

|vo_10_01_tx         = 잘 봐! 이렇게 기름을 달군 다음 수정 나비의 날개 비늘을 제거하고 솥에 넣어 튀겨…. 야, 가지 마, 진짜 맛있다구!
|vo_10_01_rm         = Jal bwa! Ireoke gireumeul dalgun sujeong nabi-ui nalgae bineureul jegeohago soche neoeo twigyeo... Ya, gaji ma, jinjja masittagu!

|vo_10_02_tx         = 우, 슬라임 버섯찜이 하나도 안 팔렸어, 비주얼이 별로인가? 맛은 죽여주는데…

|vo_12_01_tx         = 아, 여기 있었구나! 어서 와, 널 위해 한 상 차렸다구! 헤헤, 칭찬은 나중에 듣기로 하고 우선 먹어봐!

|vo_13_01_title      = 돌파의 느낌・기
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = 후아~! 상쾌해! 온몸에 힘이 넘쳐!
|vo_13_01_rm         = Hua~! Sangkwaehae! Onmome himi neomchyeo!
|vo_13_01_tl         = Hua~! I feel fresh! My body's full of strength!

|vo_13_02_title      = 돌파의 느낌・승
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = 헤이, 하! 좋아! 야생 동물을 일격에 기절시킬 수 있겠어…. 식자재의 신선도를 보장하지!
|vo_13_02_rm         = Hei, ha! Joa! Yasaeng dongmureul ilgyeoge gijeolsikil su itgesseo... Sikjajae-ui sinseondoreul bojanghaji!
|vo_13_02_tl         = Hey, ha! Great! I can knock a wild animal out with a single blow.... It guarantees the freshness of the ingredients!

|vo_13_03_title      = 돌파의 느낌・전
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = 이런 힘이 있다면…드디어…. 안돼. 벌써 침이 고이잖아!
|vo_13_03_rm         = Ireon himi itdamyeon... deudieo... Andwae. Beolsseo chimi goijana!
|vo_13_03_tl         = If I have this power... finally... No. I'm already drooling!

|vo_13_04_title      = 돌파의 느낌・결
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = 대사부께서 「100%의 요리를 만들려면 120%의 열정을 쏟아야 한다」고 하셨어. 난 알아! 오늘 여기까지 올 수 있었던 건 네가 120%의 열정으로 내 연습에 함께했기 때문이야. 응, 그럼 나도 더 큰… 더 큰 열정으로 네게 보답해야지!
|vo_13_04_rm         = Daesabukkeseo "Baekpeosenteu-ui yorireul mandeullyeomyeon baegisip'peosenteu-ui yeoljeong'eul ssodaya handa"go hasyeosseo. Nan ara! Oneul yeogikkaji ol su isseotdeon geon nega baegisip'peosenteu-ui yeoljeong'euro nae yeonseube hamkkehaetgi ttaemuniya. Eung, geureom nado deo keun... deo keun yeoljeong'euro nege bodapaeyaji!
|vo_13_04_tl         = Master said, "If you want to make a food of 100%, you have to devote 120% of your passion." I know! I was able to come this far today because you joined me in my practice with 120% passion. Yeah, well, I'll repay you with greater... greater passion!
}}
